text: "Turn Your Love Around" is a 1981 song by jazz artist George Benson. It was taken from his greatest hits compilation The George Benson Collection. It went to number 5 in the United States, number 29 in the United Kingdom, number 21 in Australia, number 10 in Canada and number 13 in New Zealand. It won a Grammy Award in 1983. It was covered by Tony Di Bart in 1995. ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:Jazz pop songs Category:Funk songs Category:R&B; songs Category:George Benson songs Category:Grammy Award-winning songs
title: Turn Your Love Around
